mean_en: a planned piece of work that is designed to find information about something, to produce something new, or to improve something
sentence: This large project, which involved building an entire hospital, was completed in just six days!
sentence_trans: 这个包含建设一整个医院的大项目，短短六天就完成了！
word_etyma: pro向前，在前 + ject扔 → 扔向前面 → project投射
